How much would you like to invest?
This is your GVT wallet address:
For depositing just send the desired amount of GVT to this address. Or use the QR code below:
Enter the desired amount of GVT you would like to withdraw:
Enter the wallet address you would like to withdraw to:
Or use your camera to read a QR code:
Double check the wallet address you entered!\nThis operation cannot be undone!
Cannot find investment programs with your request
Please grant the Storage permission in order to be able to change your avatar
The app is not able to change your avatar until you grant the Storage permission
The app is not able to change your avatar until you grant the Storage permission in Settings -> Apps
At the end of the current trading period the tokens will be returned to the manager, and your funds will be returned to you.
At the end of the current trading period your GVT will be exchanged to the manager\'s tokens. In case there won\'t be enough tokens for you, your extra GVT will be cashed back.
This program has no trades yet.
We sent a password reset link to the email you specified.\n\nPlease follow this link to reset your password.
You can send us your feedback in the following ways:
An error occurred while performing this operation
Total portfolio value is the value of all your tokens from all investment programs.

Total profit is the total all-time manager’s profit.

Avg. profit is the average profit for the period in relation to the starting balance.

Balance is the amount of funds on a trading account.

Investors is a number of investors who already invested in the manager.

Period duration is a period that is defined by a manager at the end of which all trading positions are closed, with a subsequent profit distribution. Also during this period investors can join or leave the investment program, additional investment amounts are made and the commission is paid to a manager.
Manager\’s funds share is a percentage showing the proportion of funds belonging to the manager.
Trades is a history of financial operations conducted by the manager.
Success fee is a payment to the manager for successful trading, set as a percentage of your profit.
Management fee is an annual obligatory commission, regardless of the outcome (profit or loss).

Available tokens represents a number of tokens which can be bought or requested by investors.

Dark color represents purchased tokens (NOT AVAILABLE)

Light color represents "booked" tokens via investment requests (NOT AVAILABLE)

Green color represents free tokens (AVAILABLE to purchase)
Equity chart displays the manager\'s balance\' changes during his trading activity
